name: Dark Chocolate Squares
description: Indulge in the rich, velvety texture of these classic dark chocolate squares, crafted for an intense, full-bodied cocoa experience.

name: Milk Chocolate Splash
description: Creamy milk chocolate in an artistic splash, perfect for satisfying a sweet tooth and showcasing the smoothness of our premium milk chocolate.

name: Dark Chocolate Chunk Stack
description: A stack of luscious dark chocolate chunks, offering a bold and rich flavor that’s perfect for savoring or adding to your favorite dessert.

name: Half-Eaten Milk Chocolate Bar
description: A delicious milk chocolate bar wrapped in silver foil, with a bite taken out for a tempting preview of its creamy, melt-in-your-mouth taste.

name: Chocolate Explosion
description: A burst of pure chocolate goodness, with cocoa nibs scattered around. Perfect for those looking for an intense and playful chocolate experience.

name: Assorted Chocolate Tray
description: An assortment of handcrafted chocolates, each uniquely filled and topped with elegant decorations. A delightful variety of textures and flavors in one plate.

name: Classic Chocolate Chip Cookie
description: A perfectly baked, classic chocolate chip cookie with crispy edges and a soft, chewy center. Filled with rich chocolate chips, it’s ideal for a comforting treat anytime.

name: Chunky Chocolate Delight
description: Chunky chocolate pieces give this cookie its delightful bite. Soft inside with a hint of crunch on the outside, it's a must-have for chocolate lovers.

name: Triple Chocolate Chunk Cookies
description: Soft and chewy cookies filled with triple chocolate chunks for a delightful mix of milk, dark, and white chocolate flavors. A true delight for chocoholics.

name: Plate of Chocolate Chip Cookies
description: Freshly baked chocolate chip cookies stacked on a plate, ready to share. Crispy, buttery, and loaded with semi-sweet chocolate chips, perfect for a gathering.

name: Double Chocolate Fudge Cookie
description: Decadent double chocolate cookies with a soft center and a crispy edge, perfect for anyone who loves rich, fudge flavors.

name: Stacked Chocolate Chip Cookies
description: Classic chocolate chip cookies stacked high, with a golden-brown color and plenty of chocolate chips. Enjoy these with a glass of milk for the ultimate snack.

name: Single Raspberry Macaroon
description: A perfectly baked macaroon with a light raspberry flavor and a creamy filling. Sweet, delicate, and bursting with the taste of fresh berries.

name: Pastel Macaroon Trio
description: A mix of classic pastel-colored macaroons – delicate flavors of raspberry and lemon blend perfectly. The crispy shell and soft filling make every bite an elegant treat.

name: Strawberry Delight Macaroon
description: This single pink macaroon with a strawberry-infused filling offers the perfect balance between sweetness and a hint of tartness, delightful for any sweet craving.

name: Double Raspberry Macaroon
description: A soft pink macaroon with a smooth raspberry filling. Perfectly balanced sweetness, ideal for pairing with tea or coffee.

name: Bitten Berry Macaroon:
description: A pink macaroon with a berry filling, with a bite taken out, showing off the delicate shell and creamy inside – a taste of berry goodness in every nibble.

name: Colorful Macaroon Collection
description: A vibrant assortment of macaroons in various flavors – from vanilla and blueberry to lemon and raspberry. Crisp on the outside with creamy fillings, perfect for satisfying different tastes.
